params.newForSalePrice: Intented new for sale price. Must be within rounding bounds of newContributionRate
Intented new for sale price. Must be within rounding bounds of newContributionRate
Intented new for sale price. Must be within rounding bounds of newContributionRate

BidAccepted(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a bid is accepted

BidPlaced(address,int96,uint256).notice: Emitted when for sale price is updated

BidRejected(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a bid is rejected

TransferTriggered(address,address,addres.notice: Emitted when a transfer is triggered

acceptBid().notice: Accept a pending bid as the current payer      - Must be payer      - Pending bid must exist      - Must be within bidding period

editBid(int96,uint256).notice: Edit bid      - Must be the current payer      - Must have permissions to update flow for payer

hasPendingBid().notice: Checks if there is a pending bid

placeBid(int96,uint256).notice: Place a bid to purchase license as msg.sender      - Pending bid must not exist      - Must have permissions to create flow for bidder      - Must have ERC-20 approval of payment token

rejectBid(int96,uint256).notice: Reject a pending bid as the current payer      - Must be payer      - Pending bid must exist      - Must be within bidding period      - Must approve penalty amount

triggerTransfer().notice: Trigger a transfer after bidding period has elapsed      - Pending bid must exist      - Must be after bidding period

userdoc.notice: Handles bidding using CFAs and penalities
